name: Pasta Master
description:
Pasta Master is an adventure 2D platformer set in a world where pasta based food is the most popular type of dish. The game follows Jimmy, a man who gets his pasta stolen by a mysterious figure and sets of on an adventure to get it back…

Key Features:
  • Wield the power of the fork. Use your fork to take down opponents in both melee combat and throwing it like a boomerang.

  • Six unique levels. Discover the world of the pasta master and fight six unique bosses. From the sorcerer's kingdom to the wild west, new adventures await.

  • Craft dishes for the people of Pastropolis. The people of Pastropolis love their pasta meals so much that in return for cooking them pasta they will grant you a heart.

  • Find Tims toys! Tims collectables have been hidden around the world, can you help Tim find them?
